welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vigonovo, a charming city known for its picturesque canals and Italian charm. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and create unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at S. Angelo Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
